column3: Refactored on top of headers first, including removal of gotos and cleaner flow.\n
Seems like we're going a different route to fix #5083 ...\n
We use gotos?! I thought this was usually considered bad programming practice.\n
Only misuse is bad programming practice. In this case, is makes the code more readable.\n
Wouldn't a simple `break;` suffice here given you are in a while loop?\n
